body: Ericsson Overview Ericsson is world’s leading provider of communications technology and services. Our offerings include services, consulting, software and infrastructure within Information and Communications Technology. Using innovation to empower people, business and society, Ericsson is working towards the Networked Society: a world connected in real time that will open up opportunities to create freedom, transform society and drive solutions to some of our planet’s greatest challenges.Ericsson is strongly committed to leveraging on its existing portfolio and competence to address customer needs beyond the traditional Telco customer with a focus on Energy, Utilities, Transport, Automotive, Shipping and Public Safety & Security.We are now looking for further industry experts and leaders to support us in growing our sales in industry verticals.In this role you will be reporting to Head of Global Safety & Security  Global practice and be part of a global team with highly skilled industry experts within the domain of Safety & Security.This position can be based in Bucharest/Romania OR Sofia/Bulgaria.Job Summary Drive or participate in customer engagements from lead generation to contract fulfillment, secure that consulting projects are fulfilled with quality, in time & within budget. Work closely with the customer to be able to propose improvements & identify new business opportunities. Responsibilities & Tasks •	Perform business development in Public Safety and National Security•	Continuously identify innovate profitable business opportunities•	Analyze customer & user offerings, market scenarios, customer go to market strategy.•	Drive sales engagements•	Perform up-selling & identify add-on sales opportunities•	Deliver consulting projects, managing risks & time within consultant assignments•	Share project learning & contribute to Thought Leadership•	Develop consulting practice capabilities Position Qualifications Core Competences: •	Business Development Skills•	Consultative Skills•	Negotiation & selling skills•	Project Management Skills Behavioral Competences: •	Entrepreneurial & Commercial thinking•	Persuading & Influencing•	Analyzing•	Relating & Networking•	Delivering Results & Meeting Customer Expectations•	Adapting & Responding to Change Preferred Skills: •	Interpersonal skills•	Consultative Selling Skills•	Financial Understanding•	Competitor Understanding Minimum Qualifications & Experience Requirements: •	International business development, consulting or presales experience in the area of Defense and Security•	Relevant experience in the Defence and Security Industry in South East Europe countries or the Mediterranea Region•	Good understanding of the Public Safety and National Security market in Europe•	Experience in the design and delivery of complex systems and roll out projects•	Proven experience in projects in one or more of the following Security areas: Disaster and Emergency Management, Border / city protection, Mission Critical Communications, such as Tetra, as lead solution architect or Project manager•	Excellent command of English is mandatory•	Fluent French would be very good to have Location: Bucharest or SofiaIf you are interested in this position, please send your CV + Cover Letter in English to nada.boulos.ext@ericsson.com or apply directly on our website.
title: Public Safety and National Security Consultant
